## Overview

Scisure is a research data management platform designed to help laboratories organize, track, and manage their experimental data, samples, and workflows. It provides tools for ensuring data quality, regulatory compliance, and efficient collaboration.

## Key Features

- **Sample Management**: Track samples throughout their lifecycle
- **Inventory Control**: Manage reagents, materials, and equipment
- **Workflow Automation**: Standardize and automate lab processes
- **Data Integrity**: Ensure compliance with data governance standards
- **Collaboration Tools**: Share data and protocols with team members
- **Audit Trails**: Complete traceability for regulatory compliance

## Use Cases in Research

- Managing complex sample collections
- Tracking reagent inventory and expiration dates
- Standardizing laboratory workflows
- Ensuring GLP/GMP compliance
- Facilitating data sharing within research teams
- Maintaining audit trails for regulatory inspections

## Getting Started

Visit [scisure.com](https://www.scisure.com) to learn about the platform and request a demonstration.
